name: part_002
file: tmp_【チラ見せ】HOLOLIVE FANTASY 1st LIVE FAN FUN ISLAND【 #ホロライブ3期生1stライブ 】 [IPeU2_BOwA8]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_002.mov

scenes.description: The 3rd generation hololive members gather in their dressing room before their first live concert, discussing drinks and their anticipation until a mysterious board game transports them away.
The hololive 3rd generation members perform their song 'Interact Fantasia' on a grand, ancient-style stage.

subtitles.original:
HOLOLIVE FANTASY 1st LIVE
FAN FUN ISLAND
3期生様 控室
subtitles.english:
HOLOLIVE FANTASY 1st LIVE
FAN FUN ISLAND
3rd Generation Members Dressing Room

subtitles.original: よし じゃあ みんな集まったから 準備するか！
subtitles.english: Alright, everyone's here, let's get ready!

subtitles.original: ねぇ もうちょっと ゆっくり話そうぺこーだよー
subtitles.english: Hey, let's talk a bit more, peko.

subtitles.original: せっかくのライブだよ こうしてさ 久しぶりに5人で集まったわけだしさ
subtitles.english: It's our special live concert. We finally gathered as five after a long time.

subtitles.original: いやいやいや ライブだからこそ 準備しなきゃじゃん
subtitles.english: No, no, no. Because it's a live, we have to prepare.

subtitles.original: そな言うけどさ ぺこら なんか話したいことあんの？
subtitles.english: You say that, but Pekora, is there something you want to talk about?

subtitles.original: あるに決まってるぺこだよー
subtitles.english: Of course there is, peko!

subtitles.original: 皆さん！ 好きな飲み物なに？
subtitles.english: Everyone! What's your favorite drink?

subtitles.original: えー？ そんなことー？ 今ライブの前に話すことじゃないだろ！
subtitles.english: Eh? That's it? That's not something to talk about right before a live!

subtitles.original: のーでもよくないぺこし 飲み物大事ぺこじゃねーの？
subtitles.english: It doesn't matter, peko. Isn't drinking important, peko?

subtitles.original: まぁ確かにね
subtitles.english: Well, that's true.

subtitles.original: 某アールグレイティー
subtitles.english: A certain Earl Grey tea.

subtitles.original: 出た 出た 出た！
subtitles.english: There it is! There it is!

subtitles.original: 私も今日それー
subtitles.english: I'm having that today too.

subtitles.original: そんな感じで ちょっとるしあから今ブームして うちら全員これ飲んでるからな
subtitles.english: Speaking of which, it's a trend started by Rushia, so we're all drinking this now.

subtitles.original: だけどぺこらは飲んでないんだよねー
subtitles.english: But Pekora isn't drinking it, right?

subtitles.original: 牛乳を飲んでるんだもんね ずっとずっと
subtitles.english: You're drinking milk, aren't you? All the time.

subtitles.original: 牛乳うめーぺこじゃねーかよ！
subtitles.english: Milk is delicious, peko!

subtitles.original: 美味しいけどね
subtitles.english: It is tasty, though.

subtitles.original: そういえば今日って そもそも何するんだっけ？
subtitles.english: By the way, what are we even doing today?

subtitles.original: ぺこら泣いてるんだけど
subtitles.english: Pekora is crying.

subtitles.original: 泣かないで！ 何するんだっけ？ 何するんだっけ？
subtitles.english: Don't cry! What were we doing again?

subtitles.original: 泣いてるぺこらをちょっとおいめに... 確かパーティーゲームじゃなかった？
subtitles.english: Leaving the crying Pekora aside... wasn't it a party game?

subtitles.original: そうそうそう 会場のみんなも参加できるゲームをね 用意しましたから
subtitles.english: Right, right. I've prepared a game that everyone in the venue can join.

subtitles.original: せっかくのライブだからね 歌ったりとかね わいわいやりたいじゃないですか
subtitles.english: Since it's a live, we want to sing and have a blast, right?

subtitles.original: いいじゃん 楽しそう
subtitles.english: Sounds good. Seems fun.

subtitles.original: ねー でもなんかドキドキたろうなんだけど 大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Yeah, but I'm feeling a bit nervous. Is it okay?

subtitles.original: え じゃあ ちゃんとさ ちょっとリハーサルとかしとかん？
subtitles.english: Shouldn't we do a proper rehearsal or something?

subtitles.original: でも結局さ やり始めてみないと分からないからさ
subtitles.english: But in the end, we won't know until we start doing it.

subtitles.original: とりあえずさ なんか 食べながら話さない？
subtitles.english: For now, why don't we talk while eating?

subtitles.original: どんだけぺこらやる気ないの
subtitles.english: Pekora, how much motivation do you lack?

subtitles.original: 確かにね ライブ前なのに
subtitles.english: True, even though it's before the live.

subtitles.original: もう しょうがないな
subtitles.english: Oh well, can't be helped.

subtitles.original: まーでも これが私たちらしいって言えば 私たちらしいかな
subtitles.english: Well, but if you say this is like us, then it's like us.

subtitles.original: 確かにね
subtitles.english: True.

subtitles.original: よっしゃ！ オッケー！ じゃあ景気づけに もう早速船長たち 3期生のライブを祝して 乾杯でもするか！
subtitles.english: Alright! Okay! Then to kick things off, let's have a toast to celebrate our 3rd Gen live!

subtitles.original: おー！
subtitles.english: Yeah!

subtitles.original: ちょっと待て待て待て ノエルお前何食べてんだお前！
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait. Noel, what are you eating?!

subtitles.original: え？ 何も食べてないわよ
subtitles.english: Eh? I'm not eating anything.

subtitles.original: 食べてんじゃん！ 乾杯前に食べるな 何見てんだよ
subtitles.english: You are eating! Don't eat before the toast! What are you looking at?

subtitles.original: よし 食べよう 乾杯... るしあもなんか食べてる！
subtitles.english: Alright, let's eat. Cheers... Rushia is eating something too!

subtitles.original: コンビニのあのお肉が美味しいのでちゅ～
subtitles.english: That meat from the convenience store is so delicious~

subtitles.original: お肉は後ででしょ！ 先に食べるな
subtitles.english: Meat is for later! Don't eat first!

subtitles.original: ん？ あれ？ 誰？
subtitles.english: Hmm? What? Who?

subtitles.original: あれ？ なんか今
subtitles.english: Wait, something just...

subtitles.original: 誰の声？ 今
subtitles.english: Whose voice was that just now?

subtitles.original: なんか聞こえたぺこ
subtitles.english: I heard something, peko.

subtitles.original: え 待って待って 声なんて聞こえた？
subtitles.english: Eh, wait, wait. You heard a voice?

subtitles.original: した した した！ ぺこらも聞こえたって
subtitles.english: We did, we did! Pekora said she heard it too.

subtitles.original: というかさ このボードゲームの水晶 光ってない？
subtitles.english: Anyway, isn't the crystal on this board game glowing?

subtitles.original: あ これね これ船長がね これ買ってきたんだわ
subtitles.english: Ah, this? I bought this.

subtitles.original: え？ あ 光ってるわ 光ってる
subtitles.english: Eh? Ah, it is glowing. It's glowing.

subtitles.original: 光ってるよね？
subtitles.english: It's glowing, right?

subtitles.original: ちょっと待って なんか引っ張られとる！
subtitles.english: Wait a minute, I'm being pulled in!

subtitles.original: やばい やばい！ みんな 捕まって！
subtitles.english: Oh no, oh no! Everyone, hang on!

subtitles.original: 見つけた... ようやく... 彼女たちが。
subtitles.english: I found them... finally... those girls.

subtitles.original: いんたらくとふぁんたじあ
subtitles.english: Interact Fantasia

subtitles.original: そわそわそわ 止まらないね
subtitles.english: Restless, restless, it won't stop

subtitles.original: いんたらくとふぁんたじあ
subtitles.english: Interact Fantasia

subtitles.original: いんたらくとふぁんたじあ きっとここは消えない
subtitles.english: Interact Fantasia, this place surely won't disappear

subtitles.original: めあふぁんたじあ いっそ
subtitles.english: Mare Fantasia, might as well

subtitles.original: めあふぁんたじあ いっそ
subtitles.english: Mare Fantasia, might as well

subtitles.original: だんだん目指すは頂点だ ほらついてくるぺこ
subtitles.english: Gradually aiming for the top, come on, follow me, peko

subtitles.original: ちょっちょっちょっと待って みんな一緒に ねぇねぇお頼り不甲斐ない
subtitles.english: Wait, wait, wait, everyone together, hey, hey, your support is weak

subtitles.original: 怖いものなし 進めいざファイト
subtitles.english: Fearless, move forward, now fight

subtitles.original: たまには泣いたって 踏ん張って
subtitles.english: Sometimes it's okay to cry, but hang in there

subtitles.original: 赤い手を取ってやってよ
subtitles.english: Take this red hand

subtitles.original: 冒険の幕が開ける
subtitles.english: The curtain rises on the adventure

subtitles.original: まちまちすぎて良く機能
subtitles.english: Too varied to function well

subtitles.original: その目に焼き付け
subtitles.english: Burn it into your eyes

subtitles.original: 広がる空も 海も大地も
subtitles.english: The expanding sky, the sea, and the earth

subtitles.original: 重ね合った 想い出を溢れさせ
subtitles.english: Let the overlapping memories overflow

subtitles.original: 明日へと 走り続けよう
subtitles.english: Let's keep running toward tomorrow

subtitles.original: 果てしない 夢を追う まっすぐに
subtitles.english: Chasing an endless dream, straight ahead

subtitles.original: 君となら 怖くないから
subtitles.english: With you, I'm not afraid

subtitles.original: 戸惑いも全部
subtitles.english: All the hesitation too

subtitles.original: その背中に 預け合い
subtitles.english: Entrusting it to each other's backs

subtitles.original: 道なき道も
subtitles.english: Even pathless roads

subtitles.original: 楽しみながら 走れる
subtitles.english: We can run while enjoying ourselves

subtitles.original: 心が今を告げる
subtitles.english: The heart announces the present

subtitles.original: さあ行こう
subtitles.english: Let's go

subtitles.original: 進むべき未来が 待ってる
subtitles.english: The future we should head toward is waiting

subtitles.original: ほかでもない 君がいるから
subtitles.english: Because you are there, no one else

subtitles.original: つなげよう 君と僕の世界
subtitles.english: Let's connect your world and mine

subtitles.original: ここから 旅が始まってる
subtitles.english: From here, the journey is starting

subtitles.original: いんたらくとふぁんたじあ きっとここは消えない
subtitles.english: Interact Fantasia, this place surely won't disappear

subtitles.original: めあふぁんたじあ いっそ
subtitles.english: Mare Fantasia, might as well

subtitles.original: めあふぁんたじあ いっそ
subtitles.english: Mare Fantasia, might as well

subtitles.original: 前触れ ハロー エブリデイ
subtitles.english: Omen, hello everyday

subtitles.original: 日常を照らし出す クイックエコー
subtitles.english: Lighting up daily life, quick echo

subtitles.original: びっくり バイバイ 声上げた
subtitles.english: Surprise, bye-bye, I cried out

subtitles.original: ついて来れるよね？ ピー・カー・リー
subtitles.english: You can follow, right? P-K-R

subtitles.original: いま駆け出す 時は来た
subtitles.english: The time to run out has come

subtitles.original: 心の準備は オッケー
subtitles.english: Heart's preparation is okay

subtitles.original: 鐘を鳴らせば 伝説が
subtitles.english: If the bell rings, the legend...

subtitles.original: 一歩開く
subtitles.english: Opens a step

subtitles.original: わずかに 踏み出した 勇気が
subtitles.english: A little bit of courage stepped forward
